name: Frog: The Game
description:
You are a very, very hungry frog.

The controls listed in the menu are for Xbox controller/keyboard. A PS4 controller works, but the buttons are different. Spacebar can navigate menus. Clicking out of the game window may cause the menu selection to disappear.

Credits

Chris Santos - Gameplay/UI Design & Programming

JaeWoo Joe - Gameplay Programming

Jessica Gettys - 3D Modeling & Texture Art

Soje Guajardo-Rivers - Level Design

Andrew Strunk - Level Design
